name: project44
title: project44.com
shortDescription: project44 is a Supply Chain Visibility Platform that optimizes logistics workflows from pre-transit to final mile delivery. It serves industries like shipping, 3PLs, and freight forwarders, providing tools for managing inventory, shipments, and yard operations. An example use case is a logistics company using project44 to enhance delivery efficiency and manage global shipments in real-time.
pros: Real-time visibility across all transport modes
cons: Potentially high cost for small businesses

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Descartes
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Broad logistics solutions with global reach
